# KTLM Kitchen POS System - Project Setup

## Project Type
Node.js + React + SQLite POS (Point of Sale) System for Restaurant

## Core Requirements
- Backend API for order management
- React frontend for cashier interface
- Kitchen display system
- Menu management
- Order history and reporting

## Key Features
- Order creation and management
- Real-time kitchen display
- Payment processing
- Menu item management
- Sales reports and analytics

## Technology Stack
- Backend: Node.js, Express.js
- Frontend: React, Axios
- Database: SQLite3
- Build: npm scripts

## Setup Progress
- [x] Project requirements defined
- [ ] Backend and frontend scaffolded
- [ ] Database schema created
- [ ] Core API endpoints implemented
- [ ] React components created
- [ ] Testing and deployment ready
